outputs.output_descr:
-Comprehensive assessment on aqua culture of pearls completed through data collection on oyster biology
-Increase the number of pearl farming communities and pearl jewelry businesses through transfer of knowledge on oyster/pearl culture. 
-Refine technology on pearl culture through deploying and maintaining pearl culture rafts  in the research station and in communities
-Document research findings and pearl farming as a viable alternative economic activity through preparation of pearl faming and jewelry making hand books and pearl farming  training manual.

project_descr: Pearl Culture Demonstration, Extension and Marketing project
